Posts.Content: My mammogram came back "benign" however the radiologist is asking for a Chest MRI.  There is a "bulge" in the chest wall.  Can a chest MRI see breast tissue?  Or does this mean Breast Cancer is ruled out?  Not sure why they are sending me for a CHEST MRI.  Any thoghts? WORRIED
Posts.Title: Breast MRI or Chest MRI
